description:
Everything you need for beautiful blooms

Transform your flower garden with four powerful formulas to maximize blooms, enhance growth, and improve soil health.

Stop guessing about flower care. Our complete kit combines dry organic flower fertilizer, fast-acting liquid fertilizers, and soil amendment in one easy kit. Perfect for flower beds, containers, and landscapes, you'll get targeted nutrition for abundant blooms, plus a custom-engineered sprayer for simple application.

Sunday garden fertilizers are created without pesticides or harsh chemicals—so you can enjoy your yard and get your hands dirty—not your plants.

sections.whats_included:
2 Flower & Rose Organic Garden Fertilizer (4-4-3 NPK): Rich dry organic nutrients for abundant blooms and healthy flowers.
1 WonderFert Flower Garden Fertilizer (3-8-7 NPK): Fast-acting liquid flower fertilizer formula for healthy flowering and rooting.
1 WonderFert All-Purpose Garden Fertilizer (10-2-6 NPK): All-purpose liquid plant nutrition.
1 Sunday Organics Soil Booster Soil Amendment: Soil amendment for healthier roots and soil.
sections.instructions:
Start with dry organic fertilizer: Apply at planting time or work into the soil around existing plants and water thoroughly. Reapply every 4-6 weeks.
Add soil amendment. Apply Soil Booster between feedings or in place of watering sessions and use weekly to monthly as needed.
Apply liquid fertilizers: Use WonderFert Flower for blooming plants, and apply All-Purpose to all other garden areas. Reapply every 4-6 weeks.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
What makes this kit special for flowers?
Each product is specifically formulated to promote blooming, with nutrients encouraging flower production rather than green, leafy growth.
How often should I apply each product?
Apply dry organic and liquid fertilizer every 4-6 weeks as conditions allow during the blooming and growing season. Apply Soil Booster weekly to monthly for best results.
Will this work for all types of flowers?
Yes! This kit works great for most annuals, perennials, roses, and other flowering plants in both beds and containers. Note: Some specialty flowers may need different care - check plant requirements.
When will I see results?
Liquid fertilizers may show results within days, while organic fertilizer provides sustained feeding for weeks.
Is it safe for my garden?
Yes! All formulas are safe for pollinators and beneficial insects when used as directed.
